--- title: "Latex" execute: error: false echo: true julia: execflags: ["--project=."] date: today date-format: "DD-MMM-YYYY" author: "Ragav Rajan S" format: html: self-contained-math: true anchor-sections: true theme: default toc: true toc-depth: 1 toc-expand: 1 toc-location: left toc-title: Contents number-sections: true code-summary: Show/Hide Code code-overflow: wrap code-tools: caption: Download tutorial source: false fig-format: svg fig-width: 8 fig-height: 6 self-contained: true --- **Import necessary packages** ::: {#2 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.julia .cell-code} using Latexify using LaTeXStrings using DataFramesMeta using SummaryTables using Markdown using Format using Unitful, UnitfulLatexify using CairoMakie, AlgebraOfGraphics Latexify.set_default(; starred=true) include(joinpath(@__DIR__, "..", "base-functions", "base_functions.jl")) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ``` table (generic function with 2 methods) ``` ::: ::: ::: {#4 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.julia .cell-code} full = 100 i = 1 lst = Vector{LaTeXString}() while full > 100 - 95 full = full / 2 num_l = latexify(full) num_l1 = latexify(100-full) push!(lst, "C => C/2 after $i half-life => " * num_l * "% remains (" * num_l1 * "% eliminated)") i += 1 end display.(lst); md"From the above calculation, 95% of the drug is eliminated after 5 lives." ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display .cell-output-markdown} C => C/2 after 1 half-life => $50.0$% remains ($50.0$% eliminated) ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display .cell-output-markdown} C => C/2 after 2 half-life => $25.0$% remains ($75.0$% eliminated) ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display .cell-output-markdown} C => C/2 after 3 half-life => $12.5$% remains ($87.5$% eliminated) ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display .cell-output-markdown} C => C/2 after 4 half-life => $6.25$% remains ($93.75$% eliminated) ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display .cell-output-markdown} C => C/2 after 5 half-life => $3.125$% remains ($96.875$% eliminated) ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}

From the above calculation, 95% of the drug is eliminated after 5 lives.
